Articles.Content: Hi guys! I have a problem. I have ksp on steam version 1.1.3 but RSS is not compatible. Kopernicus is not compatible and the mod does not resize the planets. No RSS textures are loaded and I use ksp 64 bit because of my computer. Please, help! Is the mod v1.1.2 or something?
Yes, as the title of the RSS thread says.

Thank you.  I will wait for the next version of the mod.

 

 

 

 

------------------Another optional message(off topic)------------------

Also, can you make a terraformed mars for ksp? I have some maps for the planet(Combined maps from internet that make a 8k map), so you will make the addon faster. I can give you some images for the bump map through links(Don't worry, they are safe). I'm working for biome map right now. Note: they are in png format, not dds.

Here is a small version of the map(Color map without specular): http://imgur.com/0JgjsY3

I will give you the color map with specular(transparency of the land) and the surface one, flipped to fit with the textures of ksp, if you want to make the terraformed mars.

Edited July 4, 2016 by The Jeb.
I am asking you this because I don't know how to change planet atmosphere, convert to dds, change sea level, find out the sea level on the bump map. Otherwise I would have made this by myself.
Sorry, I have more to do than I have time for as it is.
